dcterms:creator: Catalin Ionescu
Dragos Papava
Vlad Olaru
Cristian Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: A standard dataset for 3D human pose estimation containing 3.6 million RGB images of 7 subjects from 4 different viewpoints performing 15 actions. It provides 2D locations in image space and 3D ground truth positions in camera space for 17 body joints.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M
